description:
XBOX GAME PASS MEMBERS – Download and play by selecting "Halo: The Master Chief Collection", “Halo 3: ODST” and “Halo: Reach” under "In this bundle". 

Improved, refreshed and better than ever; The Master Chief's entire story is now optimized for Xbox Series X|S. Enjoy next-generation features like faster load times, cross-generation play, adjustable FOV, an improved split screen experience and up to 4K resolution at 120FPS.*
Honoring the iconic hero and his epic journey, the Master Chief’s entire story is brought together as Halo: The Master Chief Collection. Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Halo 2: Anniversary, Halo 3, and Halo 4 and now Halo: Reach and Halo 3: ODST are all included in one integrated experience. 

The Master Chief Collection Digital Bundle is the most expansive Halo experience yet, with a total of 67 campaign missions plus more than 120 multiplayer (including the original Halo Combat Evolved maps), Spartan Ops maps and countless ways to play with community created Forge content. Now updated with Xbox Series X enhancements, this is the collection Halo fans have been waiting for!* 

*All Up Disclaimer – Improved split screen and 4K at 120FPS only available on Xbox Series X, 1080p resolution at 120FPS available on Xbox Series S. Some game features, including hidden terminal videos, require broadband internet; ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer features require Game Pass Core membership (sold separately). 
*All Up Disclaimer – Improved split screen and 4K at 120FPS only available on Xbox Series X, 1080p resolution at 120FPS available on Xbox Series S. Some game features, including hidden terminal videos, require broadband internet; ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer features require Game Pass Core membership (sold separately). 


The Complete Master Chief Story – Honoring the iconic hero and his epic journey, The Master Chief’s entire story is brought together as Halo: The Master Chief Collection.  Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Halo 2: Anniversary, Halo 3, and Halo 4 are all included with a total of 45 campaign missions plus more than 100 multiplayer maps (including the original Halo Combat Evolved maps) and Spartan Ops maps.  Now updated with Xbox One X enhancements to provide up to 4K UHD and HDR support, this is the collection Halo fans have been waiting for!*



Halo 2: Anniversary – Celebrating Halo 2's 10-year anniversary, the iconic fan favorite returns, featuring a fully re-mastered campaign with “Classic Mode” letting you instantly switch between the re-mastered game and the original game from 2004.  Uncover new Halo 5: Guardians story elements with extended cut scenes, hidden terminal videos, and utilize all new skulls to experience the campaign in a whole new way.  Including all 25 original multiplayer maps just as fans remember them, plus 6 completely re-imagined maps.  Play the game that defined online multiplayer on consoles and get ready for the next Halo chapter.



Newly Updated – Recently refreshed with new features such as local offline LAN support, intelligent download of specific content, faster load times, and Xbox One X enhancements such as 4K UHD and HDR support* as well as optimization and refinements to matchmaking, Halo: The Master Chief Collection continues to be the definitive place to experience the origin of the Master Chief saga.



*All Up Disclaimer – Xbox One X required for 4K UHD and HDR support. Some game features, including hidden terminal videos, require broadband internet; ISP fees apply. Online multiplayer features require Game Pass Core membership (sold separately). Halo: Nightfall: 5 episode live action series is streaming only. Xbox One or Windows 8.1 or higher and broadband internet required; ISP fees apply. Must be 17+. Halo: Nightfall dates, content, and features subject to change. See www.xbox.com/halo
shortDescription: Six games, one epic saga. The Master Chief's entire story is brought together and optimized for Xbox Series X|S. : Featuring Halo: Reach, Halo: Combat Evolved Anniversary, Halo 2: Anniversary, Halo 3, Halo 3: ODST Campaign, and Halo 4, this is the definitive Halo experience.
title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
